actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to limit access by minors to cigarettes through prohibiting the sale of tobacco products in vending machines and the distribution of free samples of tobacco products in Federal buildings and property accessible by minors.
short_title: Prohibition of Cigarette Vending Machines Accessible to Minors in Federal Buildings and Lands Act

summary.text: Prohibition of Cigarette Vending Machines Accessible to Minors in Federal Buildings and Lands Act - Requires promulgation of Federal regulations that prohibit the sale of tobacco products in vending machines and the distribution of free samples of tobacco products: (1) in or around any Federal building under the jurisdiction of the Administrator of General Services or the head of a Federal agency; and (2) in Capitol buildings. Allows exceptions for areas that prohibit the presence of minors.

titles.title: Prohibition of Cigarette Vending Machines Accessible to Minors in Federal Buildings and Lands Act

A bill to limit access by minors to cigarettes through prohibiting the sale of tobacco products in vending machines and the distribution of free samples of tobacco products in Federal buildings and property accessible by minors.
